description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Toxdwellers:
Enemies' {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BOMB} debuffs have an independent 50% chance to detonate 1 additional time for each {RACE_Toxdweller} in your party. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Toxdweller
